content: What famous British scientist, known for his work on black holes and cosmology, wrote the best-selling book "A Brief History of Time"?

The famous British scientist you're referring to is Stephen Hawking. He was a theoretical physicist and cosmologist who made significant contributions to our understanding of black holes and the origins of the universe. His book, "A Brief History of Time," published in 1988, aimed to make complex scientific concepts accessible to a general audience and became an international bestseller.
